file_content.text: I taste your power. It will not save you.
You're not like the Gormak. You're a twisted being of pure evil.
I sense the dark side in you.
I can hear you in my head. How are you doing that?
You're using telepathy!
Did your master send you to stop me from looting his vault?
So the Gormak king has a pet.
The Gormak king is not my master!
I killed your Master. Do you think you can stop me from looting his Vault?
So the Gormak king had a pet.
The pathetic Gormak king was not my master!
I am born of the Dark Heart, spawned in the shadows of unspeakable power by my master, Sel-Makor!
At his command I feed upon these Gormak, corrupting them. Devouring them whole, I transform them into agents of Sel-Makor's will.
You are a foul abomination and must be destroyed.
Your evil must be purged.
Tell me more about your true master.
Sel-Makor?
This is his world. Soon he will rise from the Dark Heart and claim it!
I've already killed more Gormak than I can count. A few more won't matter.
Then they die with you.
Sel-Makor has offered you to me. Like the Gormak at my flank, you will be eaten alive. Swallowed whole. Your body will be transformed. Mutated.
Inside my stomach, your flesh will rot, and your mind will writhe until you are vomited out; reborn as a slave of this world's true master!
